constants.prompt: Generate {conversations} different dialogues of {turns} turns, between a {customerType} and a {agentType} with these SPECIFIC requirements: {instructions}
constants.instructions: Ensure that the {customerType} clearly states their {issueType} and receives a {responseQuality} from the {agentType}. The conversation should end with the {resolutionStatus}.

input.content: Please be a helpful assistant and only generate the requested dialogues.
